original_text: And the name of the other was Eliezer; for the God of my father, said he, was mine help, and delivered me from the sword of Pharaoh:
korean_text: 하나의 이름은 엘리에셀이라 이는 내 아버지의 하나님이 나를 도우사 바로의 칼에서 구원하셨다 함이더라

sentences.original_text: And the name of the other was Eliezer
for the God of my father
and delivered me from the sword of Pharaoh
